src:
Srbi u ligama petice: Radoja oduševio protiv Barselone! Kostić u timu kola, samo Lazović dobar u Italiji
Razočarali Kolarov, Milinković Savić, Đuričić, Milenković, Stefan Mitrović, Gudelj...

04 Nov 2019


(Od dopisnika MOZZART Sporta iz Rima)


ENGLESKA

LUKA MILIVOJEVIĆ je odigrao meč protiv Lestera bez velikih uspona i padova. Nije bilo dovoljno da se izbegne poraz od Lestera, ali je srpski reprezentativac zaradio još jednu prelaznu ocenu pošto su ga engleski izveštači uglavnom ocenili sa šesticom.

ITALIJA

ALEKSANDAR KOLAROV je protiv Napolija promašio drugi penal u ovoj sezoni, posle Lečea, odnosno Meret je poput Gabrijela prozreo nameru beka Rimljana i uspeo je da odbrani njegov udarac. Da nije pogrešio s bele tačke, Kolarov bi sigurno dobio prelaznu ocenu jer je praktično zatvorio sve prilaze sa svoje strane golu Lopeza. Sve ozbiljne šanse Napolija su došle sa suprotnog boka gde su bili Spinacola i Četin. Kapiten reprezentacije Srbije, uz Četina, bio je najlošije ocenjeni igrač Rome: samo njih dvojica nisu dobili prelazne ocene.



SERGEJ MILINKOVIĆ SAVIĆ prolazi kroz krizni period. U momentu kada je Lacio nanizao tri uzastopne pobede, Milinković je imao vidljiv pad forme. Protiv Milana se to najviše videlo. Brojni listovi, uključujući Gazetu i Mesađero, su samo našem reprezentativcu i Bastosu dali nedovoljne ocene u redovima Lacija protiv Milana. Štaviše, za Gazetu je Sergej bio gori i od Bastosa koji je postigao autogol. Milinkoviću je samo Korijere delo Sport dao prelaznu ocenu, šesticu, uz obrazloženje da je istina da ništa nije uradio u napadu ali da je solidno obavio defanzivne zadatke.
NIKOLA MILENKOVIĆ se nije baš najbolje snašao u ulozi lidera odbrane Fjorentine imajući u vidu odsustvo Pecele. Gazeta mu je uprkos konstataciji da nema štofa za dominantnog defanzivca dala prelaznu šesticu za komandovanje odbranom Ljubičastih. Korijere i Tutosport nisu bili istog mišljenje smatrajući ga delimično odgovornim za primljen gol i dali su mu 5,5.
DUŠAN VLAHOVIĆ je zamalo propustio priliku da se upiše u listu strelaca i donese pobedu Fjorentini protiv Parme i zaslužio je prelaznu šesticu koju su mu dali izveštači sa utakmice. Sa njim na terenu Ljubičasti su bili češće i opasniji pred golom Parme.
SAŠA LUKIĆ je ušao u igru u poslednjih desetak minuta i po rečima izveštača uspostavio je ravnotežu na sredini terena ali je rezultat za Toro već bio kompromitovan. Saša nije dobio ocenu.
DARKO LAZOVIĆ je ponovo blistao u dresu Verone. Svi ozbiljni napadi protiv Breše su dolazili sa njegove strane i sejao je bukvalno paniku svaki put kada bi se spustio po levoj strani i delio asistencije svojim saigračima. Gazeta mu je dala vrlo dobru 7 dok su ga ostali listovi ocenili, uglavnom, sa 6,5.
IVAN RADOVANOVIĆ je ušao u igru u drugom poluvremenu protiv Udinezea. Prvo je igrao u ulozi režisera igre Đenove a zatim je bio prekomandovan u odbranu. Prema izveštajima medija odigrao je na ivici prelazne ocene: nije napravio bogzna šta ali mu se ne mogu pripisati ni velike greške.
FILIP ĐURIČIĆ je takođe ušao u drugom poluvremenu protiv Lečea, ali nije uspeo da stavi svoj pečat na tok meča zbog čega je i ocenjen sa neprelaznih 5,5.

ŠPANIJA

NEMANJA RADOJA je protiv Barselone odigrao svoj najbolji meč u ovoj sezoni. Srpski fudbaler je bio među najzaslužnijim za pobedu Levantea nad Mesijem i drugovima 3:1. Radoja je asistirao za prvi gol Levantea a zatim je uz malu pomoć Busketsa zapečatio pobedu svog tima. Radoja je od Asa ocenjen sa maksimalna tri pika, Mundo deportivo mu je dao tri zvezdice a Marka dve, dok ga je Sport ocenio sa vrlo dobrom sedmicom.
NEMANJA GUDELJ se nije baš najbolje snašao na meču protiv Atletiko Madrida, između ostalog i što mu je trener Lopetegi promenio ulogu u timu prekomandujući ga iz veznog u odbrambeni red. As, Marka i Mundo deportivo su svrstali Gudelja u grupu najslabije ocenjenih igrača dajući mu po jednu zvezdicu ili pik dok mu je samo Sport dao prelaznu šesticu.
MARKO DMITROVIĆ ne nosi mnogo zasluga za vrednu pobedu Eibara protiv Leganesa 1:2. Naš golman je mogao bolje da interveniše kod primljenog gola a posle je više zbog promašaja ili greški igrača Leganesa izbegao da primi još neki gol. Zato ne čudi što su mu madridski listovi Marka i As dali po jednu zvezdicu odnosno pik.
LUKA JOVIĆ je ušao u igru protiv Betisa u poslednjih 10 minuta utakmice. Marka je konstatovala da se ulazak Luke osetio na terenu ali da to nije bilo dovoljno da dođe do promene rezultata koji je ostao 0:0.
DARKO BRAŠANAC je ušao u igru u završnici meča protiv svog bivšeg kluba Alavesa. Odigrao je samo par minuta kada je pobeda Osasune već bila obezbeđena pa nije ni dobio ocenu.

NEMAČKA

FILIP KOSTIĆ  je briljirao protiv Bajerna iz Minhena. Tri od pet golova Ajntrahta nose pečat srpskog reprezentativca (gol i dve asistencije). Filip je proglašen za najboljeg igrača utakmice i ušao je u tim kola Bundeslige. Od svih medija je dobio maksimalnu ocenu 1, uključujući Kiker i Bild.



MIJAT GAĆINOVIĆ je ušao u završnici meča protiv Bajerna i korektno je obavio svoj deo posla. Mijat uglavnom nije bio ocenjen mada su pojedini mediji dali trojku.
MARKO GRUJIĆ je na istorijskm derbiju Uniona i Herte pružio partiju na ivici zadovoljavajućeg i ocenjen je uglavnom sa četvorkom od nemačkih medija.
NEVEN SUBOTIĆ je u srpskom delu istorijskog gradskog derbija izašao kao pobednik, baš kao i njegov tim. Subotić je bolje igrao od Grujića i uglavnom je ocenjen solidnom trojkom.
MILOŠ VELJKOVIĆ je uz Gebre Selasija bio najbolji element u odbrani Verdera na meču protiv Frajburga, završen remijem 2:2. Naš reprezentativac ne snosi odgovornost za primljena dva gola i od Bilda i drugih listova je ocenjen sa trojkom.

FRANCUSKA

PREDRAG RAJKOVIĆ je i pored poraza Remsa od Nice 2:0 bio među najmanje lošim u svom timu. Štaviše, uz Abdelhamida i Šavalerena je jedini dobio prelaznu ocenu, šesticu.
NEMANJA RADONJIĆ je odigrao poslednjih 20 minuta meča protiv Lila koji je Marsej dobio sa 2:1 što mu nije bilo dovoljno da zaradi ocenu od Ekipa i drugih francuskih medija.
STEFAN MITROVIĆ se u topio u sivilo Strazbura u meču protiv Anžea koji je tim iz Alzasa izgubio 1:0. Mitrović je ocenjen sa nedovoljnom četvorkom.
VUKAŠIN JOVANOVIĆ je odigrao sasvim solidno poslednjih 30 minuta meča protiv Nanta koji je Bordo dobio sa 2:0. Vukašin je ušao u igru umesto povređenog Meksera. Nije dobio ocenu od izveštača ali je s prikazanom igrom sigurno zaslužio prealznu ocenu.


SISTEMI OCENJIVANJA U PET LIGA


ENGLESKA - Uglavnom od 5 do 10 ( 6 je prelazna), 3 i 4 se retko daju, kao 9 i 10.ITALIJA - Uglavnom od 5 do 10 ( 6 je prelazna), 3 i 4 se retko daju, kao 9 i 10.FRANCUSKA - Od 3 do 10 ( 6 je prelazna ocena)NEMAČKA - Od 5 do 1 (3 prelazna, 1 maksimalna ocena)ŠPANIJA - Zvedice ili pikovi od jedne do do tri (dve su prelazna ocena)


Piše: Željko Pantelić  


(FOTO: reuters)
text:
Serbs in fives: Radoja thrilled against Barcelona! Kostic on the car team, only Lazovic good in Italy
Disappointed Kolarov, Milinkovic Savic, Djuricic, Milenkovic, Stefan Mitrovic, Gudelj ...

04 Nov 2019


(From MOZZART Sport correspondent from Rome)


ENGLAND

LUKA MILIVOJEVIC played against Lester without great ups and downs. It was not enough to avoid defeating Lester, but the Serbian national team earned another pass mark as English reporters generally rated it six.

ITALY

ALEXANDER KOLAROV missed Napoli for the second penalty this season, after Lecce, that is, Meret, like Gabriel, saw the intent of the Roman back and managed to defend his shot. If he had not made a mistake from the white spot, Kolarov would surely have received a passing grade as he virtually closed all access from his side to the goal of Lopez. All Napoli's serious chances came from the opposite side where Spinacola and Chetin were. The captain of the Serbian national team, along with Cetin, was the worst rated player in Rome: only two of them did not receive transitional grades.



SERGEJ MILINKOVIC SAVIC is going through a crisis period. At the moment when Lazio was drawing three consecutive wins, Milinkovic had a noticeable drop in form. This was mostly seen against Milan. Numerous newspapers, including the Gazette and Messagierro, have only given our national team and Bastos insufficient marks in the ranks of Lazio v. Milan. Moreover, for the Gazette, Sergei was worse than Bastos who scored the own goal. Milinkovic gave only Corriere the offense of Sport a passing grade, six, on the grounds that it was true that he did nothing in the attack but that he performed solid defensive tasks.
NIKOLA MILENKOVIC did not do his best in the role of the leader of the defense of Fiorentina, given the absence of Pecela. Despite noting that there was no mat for the dominant defender, the newspaper gave him a pass six to command the Purple defense. Corriere and Tutosport did not share the same opinion, holding him partly responsible for the goal he received and giving him 5.5.
DUSAN VLAHOVIC almost missed the opportunity to get on the roster and win Fiorentina against Parma and earned the transition six he was given by match reporters. With him on the field, the Purples were more and more dangerous in front of Parma's goal.
SASA LUKIC entered the game in the last ten minutes and, according to the reporter, struck a balance in the middle of the field but the result for Toro was already compromised. Sasha didn't get a grade.
DARKO LAZOVIC shone again in Verona's jersey. All serious attacks against Brescia were coming from his side and he literally panicked every time he went down the left side and distributed assists to his teammates. The newspaper gave him a very good 7 while the other papers rated him mostly at 6.5.
IVAN RADOVANOVIC entered the game in the second half against Udinese. He first played the role of director of the Genoa game and then was promoted to defense. According to media reports, he played on the verge of a passing grade: he did not do much, but no major mistakes could be attributed to him.
FILIP ĐURIČIĆ also entered in the second half against Lecce, but failed to put his stamp on the course of the match, which is why he was rated at an unbeaten 5.5.

SPAIN

LOWER RADIO played his best match against Barcelona this season. The Serbian footballer was among the most responsible for Levante's victory over Messiah and comrades 3: 1. Radoja assisted for Levante's first goal and then, with a little help from the Buskets, sealed his team's victory. Radoja was given a maximum of three points by Asa, Mundo deportivo gave him three stars and Mark two, while Sport rated him a very good week.
NEMANJA GUDELJ did not perform very well in the match against Atletico Madrid, among other things, as his coach Lopetegi changed his role on the team by switching him from midfielder to defensive line. Ace, Marka and Mundo deportivo ranked Goodell in the group of the lowest rated players by giving him one star or one point while only Sport gave him a passing six.
MARKO DMITROVIC does not have much credit for Eibar's valuable win against Leganes 1: 2. Our goalie could have intervened better with the goal scored and afterwards, more due to a miss or mistake by Leganes, he avoided receiving another goal. So it is not surprising that the Madrid papers of Marco and As gave him one star or peak.
LUKA JOVIC entered the game against Betis in the last 10 minutes of the game. The brand stated that Luke's entry was felt on the pitch, but that it was not enough to change the score, which remained 0: 0.
DARKO BRAŠANAC entered the game in the final of the match against his former club Alaves. He only played a few minutes when Osasuna's victory was already secured so he didn't even get a score.

GERMANY

FILIP KOSTIC was brilliant against Bayern Munich. Three of Eintracht's five goals bear the stamp of the Serbian national team (goal and two assists). Philip was named the best player of the match and entered the Bundesliga team. He received a maximum score of 1 from all media outlets, including Kiker and Bild.



MIAT GACINOVIC entered the final of the match against Bayern and did his part correctly. Myat was generally not rated, although some media outlets gave the troika.
MARKO GRUJIC provided the party on the verge of satisfactory at the historic Union and Herte derby and was rated mainly by four of the German media.
NEVEN SUBOTIC emerged victorious in the Serbian part of the historic city derby, just like his team. Subotic played better than Grujic and was generally rated a solid three.
MILOS VELJKOVIC, along with Gebre Selasi, was the best element in Werder's defense in the match against Freiburg, finished with a draw 2: 2. Our national team is not responsible for receiving two goals and from Bild and other sheets is rated with three.

FRANCE

PREDRAG RAJKOVIC was among the least bad in his team despite the defeat of Remsa Nice 2-0. Moreover, with Abdelhamid and Chavaleren, he was the only one to receive a passing grade, six.
NEMANJA RADONJIC played the last 20 minutes of the match against Lille, which Marseille won with 2: 1, which was not enough for him to earn a mark from Teams and other French media.
STEFAN MITROVIC melted into the gray of Strasbourg in the match against Angers, who lost to Alsace 1-0. Mitrovic is rated as under-four.
VUKASIN JOVANOVIC played quite solidly in the last 30 minutes of the match against Nantes, which Bordeaux won with 2: 0. Vukasin came into the game instead of the injured Mexer. He didn't get the rating from the reporter, but with the game shown, he certainly deserved a passing rating.


5 LEAGUE ASSESSMENT SYSTEMS


ENGLISH - Mostly 5 to 10 (6 is transitional), 3 and 4 are rarely given, like 9 and 10. ITALY - Mostly 5 to 10 (6 is transitional), 3 and 4 are rarely given, like 9 and 10. FRANCE - 3 to 10 (6 is a passing grade) GERMANY - 5 to 1 (3 is a transitional, 1 maximum grade) SPAIN - Zips or dots of one to three (two are a transitional grade)


By: Zeljko Pantelic


(PHOTO: reuters)
